SELECT A.*,B.COMPANY_NAME FROM (SELECT REPORT_ID ,REPORT_NAME ,COMPANY_ID ,REPORT_TYPE ,CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE=0 THEN '주간보고' WHEN REPORT_TYPE=1 THEN '월간보고' ELSE 'ETC' END AS REPORT_TYPE_NM ,PROJECT_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM REPORT_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND REPORT_TYPE IN
${item}
AND REG_DT >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL #{searchRadio} MONTH
AND REG_DT >= #{sDate} AND REG_DT <= #{eDate}
) A LEFT JOIN COMPANY_INFO B ON(A.COMPANY_ID=B.COMPANY_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND A.REPORT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND A.PROJECT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND A.REPORT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND B.COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC

SELECT A.*,B.COMPANY_NAME FROM ( SELECT REPORT_ID ,REPORT_NAME ,COMPANY_ID ,REPORT_TYPE ,CASE WHEN REPORT_TYPE=0 THEN '주간보고' WHEN REPORT_TYPE=1 THEN '월간보고' ELSE 'ETC' END AS REPORT_TYPE_NM ,PROJECT_NAME ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM REPORT_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID=#{REPORT_ID} )A LEFT JOIN COMPANY_INFO B ON(A.COMPANY_ID=B.COMPANY_ID)

SELECT CONCAT( 'RP','-' ,DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'),'-' ,LPAD(IFNULL(MAX( SUBSTR(REPORT_ID,13,2) ),-1)+1,2,'0') ) FROM REPORT_INFO a WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DT >= CURDATE() AND REG_DT < CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY
